title: ONGC shares in focus after mixed Q1 results
summary: ONGC shares: ONGC posted an 18.2% YoY rise in Q1FY26 consolidated net profit to ₹11,554.21 crore, even as revenue fell 3.2% to ₹1,63,108 crore. Standalone profit dropped 10.2% YoY to ₹8,024 crore but grew 24% QoQ, while standalone revenue slid 9.3% YoY to ₹32,003 crore.
fullContent: ONGC shares: ONGC posted an 18.2% YoY rise in Q1FY26 consolidated net profit to ₹11,554.21 crore, even as revenue fell 3.2% to ₹1,63,108 crore. Standalone profit dropped 10.2% YoY to ₹8,024 crore but grew 24% QoQ, while standalone revenue slid 9.3% YoY to ₹32,003 crore. EBITDA declined 2% YoY to ₹18,657 crore.

title: From Tata Motors to Adani: 141 companies see profits & sales decline in Q1. Is your portfolio at risk?
summary: The June quarter earnings season disappointed investors, with many companies reporting simultaneous declines in sales and profit. Despite some sectors like cement and healthcare showing strength, large sectors including IT, financials, and auto experienced weak earnings growth.
fullContent: The June quarter earnings season disappointed investors, with many companies reporting simultaneous declines in sales and profit. Despite some sectors like cement and healthcare showing strength, large sectors including IT, financials, and auto experienced weak earnings growth. Experts remain cautiously optimistic, anticipating a recovery in the second half of FY26, driven by factors like rate cuts and a favorable monsoon.

fullContent: HAL shares: HAL reported a 3.7% YoY drop in Q1FY26 net profit to ₹1,383.77 crore despite a 10.8% revenue rise to ₹4,819.01 crore, driven by stronger execution and demand. fullContent: India and China are restoring economic links strained by a deadly 2020 border clash, the latest sign Prime Minister Narendra Modi is drawing closer to BRICS after US President Donald Trump hit the South Asian nation with a 50% tariff.

title: Japan Five-Year Bond Sale Draws Weakest Demand Ratio Since 2020
summary: Japan’s five-year government bond auction saw a demand ratio that was weaker than the 12-month average amid renewed concerns over poor liquidity and volatility in the nation’s debt market. The ratio was the lowest since 2020.
fullContent: Japan’s five-year government bond auction saw a demand ratio that was weaker than the 12-month average amid renewed concerns over poor liquidity and volatility in the nation’s debt market. The ratio was the lowest since 2020.

title: Japan Bond Auction Spotlights Fragile Demand And Rate Hike Fears
summary: Japan’s five-year government bond auction saw the lowest demand since 2020 amid the prospect of tighter monetary policy and renewed concerns over poor market liquidity.
fullContent: Japan’s five-year government bond auction saw the lowest demand since 2020 amid the prospect of tighter monetary policy and renewed concerns over poor market liquidity.

title: Zota Health, Fortis Healthcare, and 2 other stocks witness 5-year swing high breakout
summary: A 5-year swing high represents the highest price a stock has reached within a five-year timeframe. This level acts as a significant resistance point where the price has historically struggled to go beyond.

title: Search under way for man, 38, who failed to return rented canoe in Hong Kong
summary: A search is under way for a man who was reported missing after failing to return a rented canoe in Hong Kong’s Sai Kung, according to police. The force said on Wednesday that it received a report from an employee of a boat rental company in Sha Ha in Sai Kung at around 7pm the...
fullContent: A search is under way for a man who was reported missing after failing to return a rented canoe in Hong Kong’s Sai Kung, according to police. The force said on Wednesday that it received a report from an employee of a boat rental company in Sha Ha in Sai Kung at around 7pm the previous day. The employee said that the foreign man, 38, had not returned as scheduled and was believed to be missing. Police, the Fire Services Department, Marine Department and Government Flying Service are involved in...

title: Rare China Protests Against Xi’s Frontline Officers
